mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_rcpt_ship ( wh_id, shipment_number, carrier_id, trailer_number, date_expected, date_received, date_shipped, status, comments, workers_assigned, pro_number, arrival_sign, arrival_date, grn_send_sign, grn_send_date, shipment_receipt_date, asn_type, wip_number, file_seq, tallysheet_is_printed ) VALUES ( #{whId}, #{shipmentNumber}, #{carrierId}, #{trailerNumber}, #{dateExpected}, #{dateReceived}, #{dateShipped}, #{status}, #{comments}, #{workersAssigned}, #{proNumber}, #{arrivalSign}, #{arrivalDate}, #{grnSendSign}, #{grnSendDate}, #{shipmentReceiptDate}, #{asnType}, #{wipNumber}, #{fileSeq}, #{tallysheetIsPrinted} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_rcpt_ship t WHERE t.wh_id = #{whId} AND t.shipment_number = #{shipmentNumber}
SELECT * FROM t_rcpt_ship t WHERE t.wh_id = #{whId} AND t.shipment_number = #{shipmentNumber}

SELECT * FROM t_rcpt_ship t LEFT JOIN t_rcpt_ship_po l1 ON t.wh_id = l1.wh_id AND t.shipment_number = l1.shipment_number LEFT JOIN t_rcpt_ship_po_detail l2 ON l1.wh_id = l2.wh_id AND l1.shipment_number = l2.shipment_number AND l1.po_number = l2.po_number LEFT JOIN t_rcpt_ship_carton_detail l3 ON l2.wh_id = l3.wh_id AND l2.shipment_number = l3.shipment_number AND l2.po_number = l3.po_number AND l2.line_number = l3.line_number AND l2.item_number = l3.item_number WHERE t.wh_id = #{whId} AND t.shipment_number = #{shipmentNumber}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_rcpt_ship WHERE wh_id = #{whId} AND shipment_number = #{shipmentNumber}
